Summary Heading: Great hotel for long term stay
Summary: The King bed suite was spacious and comfortable for 3 adults. We stayed there for 8 nights. The complimentary breakfast had good options and variety. The front staff is extremely helpful and friendly. I appreciated the free washing machines and dryers although they're old but they did the job. The hotel had many families with young kids yet was surprisingly quiet!

Summary Heading: Good hotel, nice staff, rooms were very nice.
Summary: We spent 1 night at the hotel, the suites were well equiped and suitable for an extended stay.  Its located away from the freeway in a area that feels very safe to stay in. It has a pool, basketball court and gym.  Honestly we would make this a regular stay except there was a bunch of people who started smoking marajuana in the basketball court and the hallway reeked of marajuana, it was pretty obvious that was going on. So we probably won't stay here again since that is allowed.

Summary Heading: High quality stay with great amenities. We spent 5 nights. Hot bfast fantastic!
Summary: My 11 year old son and I enjoyed this hotel immensely. He said it should be a 5 star. The hot breakfast had many options and was high quality. The evening happy hour had great variety and was tasty. The pool is small but clean. Basketball court and outdoor area provide nice relaxation areas for families. Our favorite part was the ping pong table in the (free!) laundry area. We borrowed the paddles and played often! Super fun. Nice staff, too.  Pillows were high quality and comfy. The bed was a bit hard but that’s my only semi- negative aspect of the review. Satellite tv was a little glitchy. We would def stay again.  Great area close to many restaurants and stores for essentials.

A comfortable suite with a full size fridge, microwave, dishwasher, and cooktop  was all we needed for our 4-day stay.  As a bonus, the hotel had a social in the lobby for 2 of the nights, with tasty and complementary beer and wine.  The room also included a free hot breakfast, which was far above the powdered eggs and cereal typical of hotels in this category.  Overall, I was pleasantly surprised with the cleanliness and amenities.
Room tip: Hotel is not located on busy street, so exterior noise was not an issue

Summary: I really have no complaints about our 2wk stay. The location is fabulous - so close to multiple stores.  We really appreciated the meals - made it super easy for our life change of moving to another state. The kitchenette was sparsely outfitted but I brought some things w/ us in preparation for such. Having a full-size fridge & dishwasher was fantastic. I'm sure I could've called for additional items, but it wasn't necessary. The laundry could get a little busy, but I appreciated being able to do it on property. My girls enjoyed the hot tub every evening while we set up for sleeping. The grounds are great, as is the exercise facility.  Mimi at the front desk was incredibly helpful & so kind. I needed legal-size paper for paperwork for my daughter's new school & couldn't find it
Room tip: Patrons w/ pets are required to stay on the 1st floor, so if you want to avoid that I'd ask...

Summary: I stayed at the staybridge for almost a week. The general employees were good but from the get go I had issues with the GM understanding my reservation status that required multiple calls with customer service reps just to straighten out. It wasn't until we had the cs team call the GM directly to sort things out. It was never a pleasant experience talking with their management as I got the impression they felt higher than their customer. I requested a minor room cleaning and was told they wouldn't do it. Overall cleanliness was not bad and the general atmosphere including the other people staying here was good. Just caution you may have some problems when interfacing with their management.
Room tip: Use your GPS to find this place
Manager Response: Dear Prxmt, Thank you for your feedback regarding your experience with our hotel, especially management. I'm terribly sorry you feel that management wasn't pleasant and I can assure you that that's never our intention or goal. We take pride in treating each and every guest fairly and equally. I'm not sure what challenges you are referring to in particular but a "minor room clean" is not an issue and we would gladly honorsucv  a simple request any chance we can. Maybe it was requested after hours when staff is not available or its  COVID related as we are not entering guests rooms daily for the safety of our guests and staff. We are certainly not "higher" than our customers. that goes against our principles as hotel professionals and if any one on our team felt that way, we would recommend a different line of work to those individuals right away. We will take you comments and share them as a team and look for areas to improve.  Thank You,

Summary Heading: Crowded and a little noisy but a decent option for the area
Summary: Stayed over a Thursday night on a free night award. The hotel kindly upgraded us from a studio to a one bedroom suite due to our Spire status.  It was very crowded and almost fully booked. There was a team of student athletes checking in ahead of me and there was only one person manning the front desk in the evening so there was a bit of a wait. The sports team was very loud but thankfully we were not assigned a room near them. We were on the ground floor in the East side (I think that's where many people with pets are assigned) since we had our dog with us ($75 fee). FYI - there are waste bag stations in the parking lot and some grassy patches that run along the sidewalk on the North side of the hotel.  The room had very dated decor but was surprisingly clean. Even before

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for Families and Groups
Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel with another 15 families for a youth sports tournament. This is a great hotel for families and groups. We booked a two bedroom suite with a one queen bed in one and two more the other bedroom. The suite had a living/dining room area with a kitchenette which has a full-size refrigerator, an electric stove-top with two burners, a microwave and a dishwasher.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. Whether we needed bucket-loads of ice for the coolers, reserving the BBQ area in the courtyard for dinner, hooking up a laptop to the TVs in the dining area to review games, etc. everything we asked for we received.  Breakfast is included and so is a manager's dinner Monday through Thursday.  We will definitely come back.

Be careful not to book through CCI/Getaroom/Guestreservations as this company is a big money grab. However, Staybridge seems content to work with them. TripAdvisor reviews show up on the Getaroom site, so here I am. This hotel and Getaroom worked together to bait and switch my family. Good price, HUGE fees, downgraded room to one bed instead of three. Staybridge refused to refund or give me the right room. So did Getaroom until I reviewed them online. Issued a refund (we will see if I get it) but started emailing to tell me to change my rating. Absolutely not. Staybridge Lake Forest plays a mean game of “Who? Me?” but then said they could give me the room I had reserved (which she previously said was sold out) only if I cancelled with the third party and rebooked with them at
Manager Response: Dear MomWantsaCleanRoom, Thanks yo for taking the time to write a review.we take our guests comments and feedback serious and will share with our team to help us be better at taking care of our guest. I truly understand your frustration in the situation that happened with your reservation. unfortunately, the reservation you booked with the third party company and the reservations sent to us was not the same. We made the reservation(system generated by your third party supplier) based on what was sent to us. We also were sold out on the night of your arrival so we had no recourse but to offer you the room that was booked for you by the third party. of course if we had the room you needed available, we would have help find a solution that would have gotten you the room type you were expecting. We try our best to provide a great experience for every guest and this was one of those situations where there was absolutely nothing we could do about the room the booked between you and the third party agency. "the right room" simply wasn't available as an option due to being sold out. I'm also sorry that the company you booked with wouldn't help accommodate you if a larger room was needed as we tried to help by cancelling the reservation which will allow them to book you elsewhere that had the room type you needed. I would love for you to give us another try... book with us directly and i'll personally make sure yo have everything you need leading up to your arrival. If you would like to stay again and get the correct experience, please contact m and i'll work out dates thats best for you and we have the availability.  Take Care, Rodd Smith

Summary Heading: Lots of room to sleep, prepare food and relax
Summary: This place appeared to be in a business park area for folks staying for more then a few days. We had gone to Laguna Beach and couldn't afford a room in that town. This was a short 20 minute drive from there. How nice and roomy. We had a full sized fridge, so there was no wondering how to fit our cooler food in the fridge. Thank for the free water bottles. We didn't use the coffee maker since the package makes 4 cups and my husband would only drink 1. The shower door slid open effortlessly. Everything felt clean. I like that the beds are placed away from the door so you're less likely to hear hallway noise.

Our large extended family needed accommodations to attend a funeral.  Rod was very welcoming, knowledgeable and set us up with rooms that met the needs for each one of our individual families.  The entire staff was very friendly and always greeted us with a smile. Rod made it a point to stop by to say hi and to see if there was anything we needed.  The rooms were clean and very spacious!  The buffets were fabulous and the indoor and outdoor spaces for us to gather were perfect.  I will not hesitate to stay here again and highly recommend this hotel.

We stayed here 2 years ago and loved the hotel. Close to my husband's meeting location, free parking, a buffet breakfast included (lots of choices) and mini meals/snacks some evenings.  We didn't have the same room as two years ago. This time our room was located just outside the breakfast/common area (but on the next floor up). It's all open to the area below and I found sound really traveled up. I could hear conversations clearly.  Also, our room was supposed to have a queen bed but it seemed more like a double bed to me. I also found the bed hard, but some people like a hard bed.  Other than those two little things, I really like this hotel. The room is large with a kitchen. The bathroom was big. It was a wheelchair accessible room and no complaints about accessibility.  The

Good hotel, clean, comfortable, friendly staff. It was easy to access. The breakfast was generous. All amenities were available in the room with free parking and free WiFi. I would highly recommend it specially for families.

Summary Heading: Another Excellent Stay At Our Home Away From Home
Summary: In the Lake Forest area you really should stay here at the Staybridge Suites.  They have an excellent hotel staff in all departments.  The property is located within 1/2 mile of many restaurants, grocery & drug stores if needed.  Also great views of the snow cap mountain. Free breakfast 7 days a week & a Happy Hour Monday thru Thursday.  We had a 1 bedroom suite with 2 double beds for the 3 of us.  Room was clean and very functional for our needs.  So I would encourage anyone traveling to the Lake Forest, Trabuco Can, Mission Viejo & Irvine to look into staying here.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Stay During our Home Renovation Week!
Summary: We live very close to the Staybridge Suites and when my husband and I needed a comfortable "home away from home" last week while the drywall contractor worked on renovating our ceilings, we were oh-so-thrilled we chose to stay here.  We visited various hotels in our neighborhood to check out the accommodations and prices and even before we checked in, we knew this was the most elegant value for the price.  When I explained our situation to Mimi at the front desk, she was very eager to work with our situation, providing a flexible check-in and possible check-out time. Moises, apparently a new employee, showed us one of the 1 bedroom King bed suites, as well as a tour of the grounds.  Elizabeth at the front desk was fabulous, as was everybody there. Such a friendly, customer

Gloria Wu and her incredible staff provided my family with a level of care that we could not have anticipated when we started our 10 week stay due to a slab leak at our house.  Staybridge became our new home and we could not have asked for more.  The team there were always helpful and friendly and the amenities from the breakfasts/dinners, free laundry, pool, gym, etc. all made our stay beyond comfortable.  We were spoiled!  Gloria on several occasions personally contacted us to make sure the hotel was meeting our needs.  Taking care of my family was the most important consideration for me....it was also the most important consideration for the Staybridge East Irvine/Lake Forest team.  I am extremely thankful and can not recommend the hotel enough!

We stayed two weeks at this location. It is a very safe location. The quality of the bed is excellent and we slept very well. The staff was very accommodating and friendly; the lobby, dining area and grounds were clean; food served for AM and PM was hot and of general good quality. Laundry facility was excellent. Carpet in the room seemed clean. This property is an excellent value. I would definitely stay again.   Areas for improvement - Dog potty area has too much dirt and little grass. Having gravel in this area would be cleaner. Tile floor in kitchen and bath appeared clean but was very dirty when wiped with a wet cloth and cleaner.

Very happy with Staybridge suites at Lake Forest.  Rooms are clean and reasonable size.  Breakfast is very good (although as a UK visitor I am always amused to have to eat off cardboard plates and with plastic cutlery.)  Hotel could do with having a proper bar.  Enjoyable stay on business.

Staybridge Suites is my favorite hotel brand for business travel, and this property is an excellent example of how good the brand can be.  I had a one-bedroom suite for a week, and it was really roomy, clean, and fresh-smelling – no overwhelming scent of deodorizer that I have found in other suites-style hotel rooms.  Both the heating and air conditioning worked well, and the Wi-Fi was absolutely perfect – fast and solid.  In fact, I noticed a Wi-Fi router right in the room, next to the desk.  There is a fully equipped kitchen (but no oven), and coffee, tea, and a pack of popcorn are supplied.  The front desk also gave me a nice little package of snacks and candies when I arrived, which was quite nice.  The hotel provides complimentary breakfast and an evening reception that was

I stayed two nights.  All the employees are friendly, helpful and do there jobs well.  The hotel is spotless. The rooms are large and so comfotable.  Breakfast was delicious with so many choices.  The evening reception was also well done - nice Mexican food the first night and burgers the next plus a fantastic salad bar.  I stay at a lot of hotel and I am now going to be disappointed after staying at this Staybridge Suites.  I will definitely return on my next visit to Orange County.

We had to move in here with our 2 grown children and 2 dogs very late at night after a severe plumbing leak in our house. They were wonderful about suggesting a better cheaper suite that would hold our whole family instead of the two individuals Suites that we had reserved. Then a week later they were wonderful to switch us to a first-floor suite when my husband had knee surgery. The complimentary hot breakfast and basically free dinners were an added treat.

Summary Heading: I really do recommend this hotel.
Summary: The best hotel I've ever stayed at and ive stayed at pretty much every hotel in orange county. it's such a good price. Everything is great from the management, hotel staff and maids, the rooms are very cool they have rooms that are like a one bedroom apartment cuz u get a living room area, a kitchen already equipped with cooking pots and eating utensils, a bedroom that u can close out the living room and with a big walk in bathroom with closet. Oh and FREE BREAKFAST EVERY MORNING.

Summary Heading: Good Sized Suites, Friendly Staff, Good Value (and noisy HVAC)
Summary: For the money, Staybridge offers well laid out and furnished suites, with useful and well appointed kitchens and a decent breakfast buffet.  Nothing fancy here, but it's very clean, well run and the staff is friendly and responsive.  The suites have a good sitting area and large TVs in both sitting area and bedrooms.  Bathrooms are large, with good showers (OK, a bit more water pressure would be nice) and linens are more than adequate.  The only fault, and this is normal for any hotel in this class, is that the HVAC units are wall mounted (at least in our room) and noisy.  In our case this was made worse by the fact that the unit was mounted in the bedroom with the main outlet near the foot of the bed.  The unit is noisy enough to preclude sleep for any but the soundest

Claudia at the front desk always providing great service, Jimmy has a great attitude, all staff great, rooms and facilities clean, fitness room well equip, food service excellent , Staybridge suites it is worth it, accomodations are highly recommended

Summary Heading: If I could give a 0 Star I certainly would.
Summary: I booked this room for my adult kids to have a nice place to stay and this hotel turned them away at 11:30 pm at night because they were not 21 (oldest was 20). I have booked rooms for them previously thru IHG and never had a problem. I was horrified that they would be treated that way and had to scramble to find another place to stay that late at night. Never will I stay at this hotel or possibly this chain. My next move is to call Customer Support.
Manager Response: Hello Jessica, We understand how you must have felt regarding your adult kids unable to check into the hotel. I must tell you that our staff treats everyone, regardless of age, with respect and the utmost hospitality possible so please do not look at the unfortunate situation with your kids as being mistreated. Please understand that  because the hotel serves alcohol to our adult guests through the "honor system" (no one serving or monitoring the dispenser) and no charge, Our hotel policy of being 21 to check-in is to ensure that everyone registered to a room has the ability to legally access and handle alcoholic beverages as well as look after their under-aged guests traveling with them to make sure that those that are legal to drink adult beverages are the only guests that are drinking. Because your kids were attempting to check-in with no one of legal age, we were left with no other options but to decline their reservation. Whether its 11:30am or 11:00pm its our responsibility to apply this policy to all guests. Although you may not agree with this policy, its truly a safety policy for all of our guests and potentially future guests once they become 21 and over. We hope you reconsider our hotel or brand in the future as we have great value to offer to you and your kids.   Warmest wishes,

Summary Heading: Lovely cosy place for business trips or holidays
Summary: My stay was 6 nights on a business trip. The check-in was smooth. Room #230 was comfortable and spacious. Got a kitchenette and used it for my heat and eat stuff. Buffet breakfast is sumptuous and with very tasty choices. I even got my Amazon Big-day orders delivered there.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  'Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Staybridge Suites IRVINE EAST/LAKE FOREST.  Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We use feedback, such as yours, to continuously make changes to our brand to improve the guest experience. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Again, thank you for choosing Staybridge Suites, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact us directly.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: Breakfast was Quite a variety and satisfying, buffet style make your on waffles. Pool is very nice, plenty of towels. It does loose the sun early afternoon. The staff is delightful and very helpful. WiFi recently updated
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Staybridge Suites IRVINE EAST/LAKE FOREST.  Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We use feedback, such as yours, to continuously make changes to our brand to improve the guest experience. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Again, thank you for choosing Staybridge Suites, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly at  or rod@lakeforestsbs.com.  Sincerely, General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed for a week in February. He was in Lake Forest on business.  We stayed in a wheelchair accessible room.  I believe all rooms are suites in this hotel. Our room was huge with a separate bedroom with king bed, fully equipped kitchen, living room area and huge bathroom.  Free parking, full buffet breakfast (free) and 4 evenings a week (Monday to Thursday) there is a small meal (fajitas, hot dogs, wings, etc).  The location was great for my husband, only a few minutes to his office each day. Lots of shopping and restaurants nearby.  The lovely courtyard has a basketball court, pool, seating area with fountain and BBQ's.  No complaints about this hotel at all, the staff were very friendly as well.

I have one of my best experiences, staff was so friendly and helpful, when I arrived Bobby welcome me with such professionalism, Claudia assisted me in all my request and Jimmy was so helpful, same a Natalie, all staff was great. Accomodations were superb, room clean and neat, food was great. I definitely a place to stay, I will be back in June
Manager Response: Dear Ulises A,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Staybridge Suites IRVINE EAST/LAKE FOREST.  Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We use feedback, such as yours, to continuously make changes to our brand to improve the guest experience. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Again, thank you for choosing Staybridge Suites, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly at  or rod@lakeforestsbs.com.  Sincerely, Rod Smith  rod@lakeforestsbs.com

Summary: We stayed in a two-bedroom suite and loved it! The space was perfect; the room was fresh and clean. Breakfast was more than adequate with choices for everyone. We would definitely recommend for families and stay again!

We stay overnight for the new year and we had an excellent stay. Well maintained Pool, gym, laundry, breakfast, wifi, stove and fridge. Excellent option for family vacations on a budget or extended stay.

Stayed here for 2 nights, we styed at 2 other Staybridge during our trip and this was by far the best one. Service was great, the room was clean and spacious. Located in a quiet area but also not too far from Irvine Spectrum which is a very nice shopping area. Awesome.

Summary Heading: A perfect place to recharge during a trip
Summary: This is a perfect place to spend time while traveling. My suite, although very reasonably priced, was spacious and very comfortable, with, among other niceties, strong WiFi, a huge flat screen TV, a full size refrigerator, a microwave, and a dishwasher. The bed was wonderfully comfy. The free breakfast was excellent - in addition to the usual fare of cold cereals, pastries, and beverages, it included along with other things, freshly cooked eggs, bacon, sausage, old-fashioned oatmeal, walnuts, yogurt, cottage cheese, and a variety of fresh fruits. I also enjoyed walking/jogging around the walk-dedicated paths in the nearby neighborhood. I definitely plan to stay there again next time I am in town.

Summary Heading: Beautiful suite and exceptional service provided by Mimi
Summary: Beautiful three-room suite with separate large bathroom, bedroom, and combined living room/kitchen.  Mimi checked us in with professionalism and overall kindness.  Free dinner with lasagna, breadsticks, salad bar, and beer/wine.  Breakfast buffet has selection of eggs, meat, fresh fruit, yogurt, and pastries.  Very nice facility.

Summary Heading: A place full of the "Small things".
Summary: Location was perfect for my needs.  Room location was good. I've been in countless hotel rooms and to be honest have become a bit jaded. The bathroom! Huge! Curved glass barn door style. It was enough to be out on #1 value for price hotel in Lake Forest.

Summary Heading: charming hotel, very large room, great snacks
Summary: The room is realy big and has a small kitchen. breakfest  is nice. Greate swimming pool and jacuzzi. WIFI is strong, there is a desk which is comfortable. The hotel is minutes close to business in lake forest.

I had the chance to accompany my husband on a two week business trip to this hotel the second half of September.  The first room assigned to us was small, but very clean with a queen size bed.  Cleo, the assistant manager, was very helpful in getting us upgraded to a room with a king-sized bed for the second week of our stay.  The one bedroom king suite was quite large with a small kitchen attached to the living room area.  The king sized bed was very comfortable. There was a flat screen TV in both the separate bedroom and the living room.  This room was also immaculately clean.  Free breakfast, with real eggs, were available every morning as well as a happy hour in the evening which included some type of dinner food, like chicken fingers, wings, spaghetti, etc.  Free beer or

I have stayed at this hotel several times, and usually for close to a week. It's an excellent property that surpasses your typical business travel needs.   Though it is not the most luxurious hotel (remember to bring your toiletries), it definitely is clean, comfortable bed, spacious room. The rooms are also up to date - I'd take this over staler older "luxury" hotels. Having access to a fridge/microwave on a stay is also appreciated. The outdoor space is nice, and can easily get some work done there. Free laundry is a plus. Breakfast is ok - standard selection of fruit, and evening wine hour with snacks gives you a quick break at the end of the day. The hotel definitely goes out of their way to ensure things are clean, well maintained, and variety offered.   The service here is

I stayed in Staybridge for around 14 days in August 2017. I had stayed at this hotel around 5 yrs back. The hotel is newly renovated however the hospitality is the same, "Excellent". The rooms are large, clean and well maintained. The room also has small  a cooking area for preparing the  food along with the dishwasher. The housekeeping department takes care of cleaning the room daily. The hotel has a well equipped gym and swimming pool with Jacuzzi. The hotel has a laundry room with washer and dryer machines which can be used by the guest. There is Walmart, Target mall and many restaurants nearby the hotel to make it a good option for stay. Overall I enjoyed my stay at staybridge and would love to come here again.

Our water polo team stayed here and had an amazing experience!!! The staff is wonderful!  Beds are really comfortable.  They give you free breakfast and dinner (during the week).  Seriously great staff and we could not have been happier with the hotel!

We stayed here three years ago and were very impressed. So, for this recent visit, we didn't even look at the competition. The hotel lived up to its reputation in our mind, so we highly recommend Staybridge. No negatives at all.

Summary Heading: Very functional not so fancy hotel
Summary: The place is clean, offers hot breakfast, is pet friendly, has a good environment for complementary evening eats/drinks. The staff is very friendly and goes out of its way to make your stay comfortable.

I didn't want to leave my dog alone on the 4th of July while I attended a wedding, so I booked a room at the Staybridge.   A very nice hotel!  Pet fee was $100.   I stayed in a one bedroom suite with a small kitchenette and huge bathroom.

We only stayed one night, but I wanted to move in! The rooms are huge! The beds are very, very comfortable. The windows open. The suite had 2 TVs. It was very clean. And, it looked great for someone needing a longer-term stay. They have social hours and a buffet breakfast. The only issue we encountered was that the chemicals in the jacuzzi were off, but the staff leapt into action as soon as I informed them of the problem.

Summary Heading: Nice place but A/C was loud
Summary: in area for soccer tournament, so had a group stay here. Nice facility with nearby restaurants, stores, etc and price was reasonable. did not get back to hotel until late due to games and found room to be hot so kicked the air conditioner on.  A/C in our room was extremely loud to the extent that it would wake us up every time it kicked on.  Checked with others that stayed in hotel and got input that this was an isolated problem. didn't call front desk as was late and we were exhausted.  breakfast bar was perfect for group of kids off for full day of soccer.

The room was spacious, separate bedroom, kitchen. Everyone was helpful. located about a mile from a shopping center,they had about anything that you would need. Monday thru Thursday evening meals served. Wine and beer also served. Great value for the money.

I stayed here with my daughter for a weekend getaway and it didn't disappoint! The minute e walked in we were in heaven. The amenities were great and the people were super nice! Best breakfast in town!

We have had many clients stay at Staybridge Suites but I have never stayed myself.  When we were recently displaced due to water damage to our home, they were the first I called.  Everyone was so accommodating and welcoming at our time of need with a very scared puppy.  I highly recommend Staybridge and thank you to Cleo and the entire staff for our home away from home.

Stayed here on a long term business trip. The staff are genuine, courteous and helpfull in there dealings with customers. They will go beyond need in making your stay comfortable.  The rooms are clean and spacious and include a fridge, microwave and two ring hob.  The swimming pool and hot tub are recently refurbished and there is no shortage of fresh towels. The hotel runs a shuttle within a five mile radius which is a major bonus.  Would have no problem in recommending or staying here again.

Summary Heading: I stayed there twice in a month - good hotel while expensive
Summary: Good hotel with free diner (including beer and wine) if you want to spend you evening there. Breakfast is included. The WIFI is slow when the hotel is busy (which happened on my first stay). The rooms have kitchen with micro-wave and fridge.

This hotel is sumptuous and very California friendly. Pray Mimi or Bobby are working at the front desk. They transported us to a restaurant when they got off work! I never encountered such kindness in all the 53 years I have been in business. Great place, great people, you will not be disappointed! TJE

Stayed here for six weeks on a business trip with multiple coworkers. The standard and level of service here is second to none. A long side an amazing location with great amenities. Staff are super polite to add to the experience. Would recommend to anyone.

I stayed for two nights on a business trip and it was perfect, or nearly so.  Such a quiet place! Never heard doors slamming or the other typical noises that make sleeping in a hotel difficult.   The bed was comfy, staff friendly, and room immaculate. They even have a wonderful shuttle on call to get you from here to there.

We stayed a night right after our wedding. They had complimentary water and popcorn.  Great experience.  We were so tired but we loved how clean the room and bathroom was.  The breakfast the next morning was good. A lot of variety, and tasty.  Highly recommend the stay.

Stayed here a night due to flight issues out of SNA and was very impressed with this hotel. Very clean, spacious, modern, quiet rooms. And helpful staff! My room included a full kitchen with complimentary coffee, tea and pop corn. Good size flat screen TV and comfortable bed. I definitely recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Clean Rooms! Excellent Service! Amazing Breakfast!
Summary: Checked in on 10/1 for a 1 night stay with the family.  I appreciated the free upgrade to a 1 bedroom (2 queen) from a studio for being IHG Spire Elite Members.  Rooms are very clean / spacious.  Loved the breakfast and the front desk service by Alana and Mimi.    We will definitely be coming back here on our next visit.

Apartment clean and spacious. Outdoor parking which was well lit.  Easy place for a base away from the hustle and bustle of LA.  The amenities were very good but what left me with the best memory of the stay was the wonderful helpful staff.  Honestly nothing was a problem.  The complimentary breakfast was great and the happy hour for drinks was welcoming.  Highly recommend and now we have found this chain we will stay at other Staybridges across America.  Thank you Staybridge for making our visit so pleasant.

My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights. The staff was very helpful and courteous no matter the time of day. They provided us with directions and travel times to multiple destinations. The breakfast and dinners that were included were amazing. Everything you could want and more. The rooms were very clean. The kitchen had a small stove top and fully furnished for self cooking as well. I would highly recommend staying here if you want to be close to tourist attractions (only about 25 minutes from Disneyland and 30 minutes from the beach.) We will be booking with Staybridge Suites anywhere they are from now on.

My wife and I elected to stay here with our 1 year old because they suites that have a separate living area and can be closed off. The staff here were really nice and the suites have things that you dont think about and BAM! Its there. The location is okay. Kind of in a area where it takes it bit to go places but it suited us. Def would stay here again.

Spent a week here with family, and we were all impressed. Clean, spacious suite, courteous staff, and pretty decent free breakfast. Property was recently remodeled. We rented a 2-bedroom suite (2 queens in one room and 1 in the other). Each bedroom had a private bath, and there were separate climate controls - one for the living area and smaller bedroom, and the other for the larger bedroom. Living area was spacious, with sofa-bed (we didn't pull it out), dining table, and kitchenette that included full-size refrigerator, 2-burner cooktop, microwave, toaster over, dishwasher, dishes/glasses, and a few pots and pans. Property includes a small fitness center and a guest laundry (free - supply your own soap). Wifi was free, and worked really well. Checkout was at noon. No online

I stayed here for 2 weeks. Staff is cheerful and know there job. Breakfast was better than any staybridge i have ever been to: lots of fresh fruit choices, rice and tofu, always scrambled eggs cooked perfectly and meats and sometimes potato (hashbrowns or homefries) Coffee alwas hot and fresh. They also do weekday social. They could call it dinner, because its exctly that. Some staybridge locatios you can get finger food and snacks. Not here, here is meat, starch and veggie. Plus the beer and wine. In addition to the great food there was a beautiful pool, basketball court and grills. This is my favorite staybridge.

I have been there many times and also had extended stay. They provide good food also have shuttle services. The best part is the hospitality and the working staff. I would like to thanks Bobby, Cleo, Claudia and other staff. Dear friend I am coming once again and this time i am getting my family to have the awesome experience. See you soon.

We stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks on a business trip, the hotel has been newly refurbished, clean, friendly staff, breakfast and afternoon branch included, free internet with good speed, free car park, and located 5 min drive from the Spectrum shopping center, hotel is also in a very quite neighborhood. The hotel is  less than one hour drive from LAX in normal trafic.

Summary Heading: Good location, quiet, clean and friendly
Summary: Stayed in a recently updated one bedroom suite.  Nice room.  Staff was friendly.  We had issues with the wi-fi, and the manager came up to fix it.  Seems a frequent problem but they were able to address it.  Breakfast buffet was good, well maintained and had ample seating.

This was our second family trip to Lake Forest and this Staybridge Inn.  We originally ordered two separate rooms for us and my 95 year old father; we requested that the two rooms be near to each other.  The next day, we received a call from the manager offering us the option of a two bedroom suite.  We are glad we took it and so was my father.  There was enough privacy and each bedroom had its own full bathroom; there was a kitchen and TVs in each bedroom as well as the shared living room.  We give an 11 out of 10 for service and facilities!  The breakfast buffet was great too!

I have been staying at this hotel regularly for six years and the staff at the hotel has become like a second family. They are the friendliest and most welcoming people I have ever encountered in a hotel, and that was from day one. They treat all their customers the same, the long timers and the ones there for one night. I cannot list all the times the staff has gone above and beyond the call of duty, but it is a frequent occurrence. The hotel has been remodeled in 2016, and the furnishings were already in good shape, so they re-invest in the property. I highly recommend anyone looking for a pleasant experience while traveling to stay here. And I didn't even mention the happy hour dinner and hot breakfast!

I have been living here for 3 years for a business contract that is coming to an end.  First and MOST important I have to tell you the staff treats you like you are their family. They are the most accommodating for any of your needs. Thank you everyone!!  Bobby, he's the best no doubt about it. Cleo,exceptional to making sure all was good. Rod and Gloria, always friendly. Alana , just love her. Claudia, always cheerful along with Mimi. Best housekeeper is Gaby along with Betty. Jose in maintenance can fix anything. The hotel is located in a family oriented area that is up and coming with a lot of new construction around the area. If you want quiet, this is the place to book. If you want a big night out, no...but the 405 is easily accessible. Room #344 will give you the BEST

We stayed here again for a total of 10 nights, and again we were blown away with the service. The management are excellent, the people at breakfast and social evenings are lovely and also the front desk staff, especially our favorite Bobby. Again the service we received from Bobby was outstanding, he is so lovely and welcoming and nothing is too much trouble. He just goes that extra mile for you to make sure you have an excellent stay. He really is by far the best hotel employee we have ever met, and we now consider him a friend. Thanks again for an excellent stay and hope to see you next year. Regards your Scottish guests

This Staybridge is the best one I've stayed at, ever. Hands down the nicest staff in the world. They make you feel at home. The property is very well appointed and comfortable. It is always clean and the social room is always filled with nice guests from all over the world.

This hotel is wonderful. The staff were friendly and helpful, and did everything they could to make our stay pleasant. They keep a supply of games & books to borrow & have an area set aside to use. The room was very well laid out & clean. There is a full size refrigerator, stove, microwave & dishwasher.

This is where we stay whenever we visit family in CA.  The location is convenient, the rooms are spacious and we love having a kitchen to store leftovers from family dinners.  The complimentary breakfast gives us a good start on the day as well.

We were extremely happy with our overall stay at this hotel. Bobby Le made our holiday vacation enjoyable and his courteousness was infectious.   The one bedroom suite was accommodating with all the kitchen utensils and amenities of an apartment giving us a sense of a "home away from home."  We would certainly recommend this hotel/suites to all our friends and family and pay a return trip in the future.  Mario and Lily

Summary Heading: dirty and loud due to the business run all hours of the day and night
Summary: This is the worst staybridge I've ever been to, and am IHG rewards member.  I have 5 nights here, and asked to move due to the noise, but the hotel has no available rooms.  The three story hotel currently has rennovations underway during the day on the third floor the staff told us.    All night long,, from 8pm to 6am, the room above us is banging, stomping, slamming, throwing boxes down.  They are running a small clothing business out of most of these rooms, so at night the shipping and collecting inventory by that team is performed.  Loudly.  The entire hotel seems to be staffed by asians, and the small business distributors out of some of these rooms are too, so I'm not sure if it's a business out of this hotel affiliated with the hotel or just a family thing.  It's clear
Manager Response: Hello Fakee2117, Its always appreciated to here the comments that come from our guests, especially when its something new and never heard of to our management and staff. Yes, we are under renovation to make our guests experience better than ever. We also know how important it is to get a good nights rest. That's why we enforce a policy that our renovation crew start their day after 9am and end no later than 6pm with minimum noise requirements throughout the day. So, although noise during renovation is a necessity, we do our best to keep it to a minimum. As for noise in the hotel from 8pm to 6am(due to a clothing company), this is new to our entire staff. We would never knowingly condone or permit any business operating in the hotel, shipping and receiving packages throughout the night. This is the first time this has ever been mentioned. Packages are generally picked up at our front desk when our guests return from their day, not after midnight or into the early hours of the morning. Also, we have staff working 24/7 as well a manager on duty. We would have discovered this company ourselves or had other complaints or reviews that would have alerted us to anything like a clothing company shipping and unpacking in the middle of the night but have heard nothing. I will investigate further but it may have been just a family or kids staying above you during your stay in which we could have asked to keep the noise to a minimum as well. further, we like to think we have a diverse staff and not just Asians working in the hotel. We pride ourselves on having quality staff members that all have one common goal of serving our guests to the best of our ability. I would welcome you to contact me to discuss in detail your experience and I'm sure we can offer a solution or an opportunity to stay with us again to show you how this isolated incident isn't the norm. thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Our favorite getaway place BUT now......
Summary: First let me say we still love this place. I completely understand that the need for renovation and what it takes to accomplish that. Reason for the 2 stars ------The back door is left open for an electrical extension cord that nobody is using because it is "off hours/night time". THIS is a safety issue for all occupant especially when card is required off hours to get into the place but yet here is an "open door". Daytime one can hear very loud music from the back where the work area is, all the way to the front end rooms. Very loud because you can hear it with the room window closed.
Manager Response: Hello mem68er, Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. We have already taken steps to ensure that this is no longer an issue moving forward. The renovation team is a contractor that we hired to perform our renovation construction. We have had a very serious conversation regarding safety as well as the privacy of our guests. We will closely monitor issue like this and make sure that they do not occur in the future. we value your comments and appreciate your business and hope to have you back with us very soon.  Take Care,

Summary: I can't say enough good things about the Staybridge Suites in Lake Forest CA. My husband and I are leaving today after spending 8 nights here.  The hotel is beautiful, emmaculatly clean and in a nice upscale section of town with near by stores and conveniences. The staff,front desk, house cleaning and kitchen has been most accommodating, the hot full breakfast each morning has been delicious plus they serve dinner on week nights free of charge as well. This location was an easy drive to the spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean plus we drove up Hy 74 to check out the majestic mountains seen from the hotel. If you are here on Sat or Sunday I  recommend that you worship at Saddleback Church located 2 miles from hotel. GREAT JOB EVERYONE!

Summary Heading: Not quite as good as before
Summary: I've stayed here several times over the last 4 years & this last visit was not as good. I agree with others that the rooms are not as clean or well-kept as earlier visits. Front desk staff is still pleasant & helpful.
Manager Response: Dear nijunihk,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay. I am pleased to know that you found our hotel staff friendly. On the other hand, allow me to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced due our housekeeping service. Please be assured that this concern will be looked into.   I would have preferred you had a better stay. Nevertheless, your comments are highly appreciated. I do hope that we will get another opportunity to provide you with a more desirable stay.  Sincerely,  Faith R Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: Very good hotel.  It has kitchen facilities which is very good if you want to stay longer.  Many verities of breakfast.  You can get evening snacks as well. Overall very good experience. I will prefer to stay again

I stayed here one night on a Saturday with my family.  The checkin process was very smooth sailing.  I was awarded an upgrade due to high status as an IHG member, and that is always welcome!  I found the room to be a bit worn out and old, but it was clean and the bedding seemed new.  The price is very fair for the location especially considering its maybe 5-10 minutes to the Spectrum Center depending on the traffic. Renovations appear to be happening so I would return if the price stays competitive!

Summary Heading: Hotel needs better housekeeping and maintenence
Summary: I stay at this location on business several times in the year, over the past few years. The hotel has all the usual amenities useful to the business traveler - comfortable bed, coffee pot in the room, fridge and microwave in the room, free wi fi, hot breakfast, and snacks and drinks in the weekdays, barring Fridays. These positives are unfortunately diminished by the downsides - it has increasingly become poorly maintained, with poor housekeeping. The hotel management should pay attention to these seemingly small details that greatly increase traveler satisfaction. Rooms should be sanitized sufficiently before occupancy (was not in my case), supplies should be replenished in the room, trash should be taken out, common areas such as hallways, elevators, kitchen areas should be
Manager Response: Dear Erudite, Thank you for your constructive review of the hotel during your stay. I can assure you that as a staff, we try to create the best possible experience for our guests and that starts with making sure you have a clean, functional suite at check-in. Our house keeping staff strive to do a great job of cleaning and preparing our suites for the next guest. Our management staff works closely with our house keeping team to make sure they have the tools and resources to make sure we achieve this goal with every suite. it is very concerning to us that we did not meet this goal with your suite during your stay. We will take this review and use it as a working document to improve and continue to try to preform at a high level. Also, the hotel is under a complete renovation and our staff is very excited and proud of it and will continue to work to provide a great experience for all of our guests. So, we hope you return and give us another opportunity at making your stay a wonderful experience.    Sincerely, Gloria W

Summary: I love the free breakfast that you can make your own waffle! Front desk Bobby is kind and helpful. My room has been upgraded to a suite with kitchen and sitting room its sad that I don't have time to cook this time. The bath tub is new and it's very clean. There are many TV channels that keep you enjoy for whole night, including a Japanese TV channel showing English subtitled Japanese movies! The hotel is nearby Target and the Home Depot in 10min walk. I would love to stay in this hotel again.

This is my fourth continuous month with Staybridge Suites Irvine Spectrum/Lake Forest as I am writing this review and let me tell you first hand that the experience was amazing. The Manager that I had to deal with, Cloe was extremely helpful when there was a problem with my booking and I had to extend my stay.  Staff at the front Desk (ask for Bobby or Claudia) were also very helpful for almost all of my requests, be it enrolling for their rewards program or holding a package for longer time.   The cleaning crew was amazing too. They did some times knock when I was not quite ready for them but then again, they wouldn't know because I didn't have my DND sign up. But they did tidy up the place every day and performed a full clean once a week. No complaints there. I had a problem

I stayed there on business and a disgusting sewer smell was emanating from the bathroom sink. My entire room smelled like an outhouse. There were no rooms to switch to because they were sold out and nothing else was offered. The staff declined to smell the room for themselves. Will be staying at the Best western from now on. Never again
Manager Response: Dear Jen R, We are very concerned about your experience. I'm not sure exactly what happened or why you were not given the opportunity to switch rooms. Although challenges happen, our team prides itself on taking great care of our guests, so I will discuss this with the staff and make sure that we handle situations like this as effective as possible. We understand that you have options and are planning to stay elsewhere during your next visit to the area but I would like to encourage you to try us again as I'm sure your first stay was an isolated incident. Please call me personally and we will work out an opportunity to prove to you that we are a great hotel that guests love.  Respectfully,

Summary: This review is long overdue . I stayed in Staybridges for close to a month in February 2105 and this place was nothing short of a home away from home. I thoroughly enjoyed the complimentary dinner on weekdays and its close proximity to a number of eating places. There is ample parking space and the rooms are spacious and clean. The staff is extremely warm, helpful and courteous , I remember an occasion when I broke my specs and the staff manged to fix it by using a tape. Little things like these are what makes a difference!

The location was great, and the rooms were clean. A good value for the money, and with the kitchen we saved as well. The kitchen had a large fridge, 2 burners, a microwave and a dishwasher, the morning free breakfast was very good. Enjoyed beer every day. Ample Parking

I stayed at this property for two nights for business in Irvine. The hotel is located in a residential area in the hills about a 10 minute drive from the Irvine Spectrum.  The room was $150/night for a 1 king bedroom suite. They must have run out of rooms because I was given a sweet two bedroom suite. It was very spacious, clean, cool and comfortable. The staff was very helpful with recommending  nearby restaurants. I overheard one guest complaining about the traffic noise from Bake Parkway. The bedroom I slept in faced that road.  Other than the occasional loud motorcycle, traffic noise was not an issue.  The hotel is comparable to a Hilton Hampton Inn: bedroom suites, common lounge area and free breakfast and evening happy hour food.    I enjoy an evening walk to wind down.

The location was great, and the rooms were clean, a little date though. The staff is helpful, kind and most of all calm. A good value for the money, and with the kitchen we saved as well. We were able to have 6 people in our room and everyone was comfortable for the 6 nights we were there.

We are here for our third time. Our favorite place to stay when visiting family in Southern California. The rates are very reasonible and is close to freeways. The hotel is located in a quiet area bordering a residentual neighborhood and there are resteraunts within walking distance

Stayed here 2 nights and loved it!  We had a nice king suite with a separate large bathroom and closet, a big living room area and a kitchen with plenty of counter space to eat at.  Even though the kitchen had a large fridge, 2 burners, a microwave and a dishwasher, the morning free breakfast was very good.  The food wasn't microwave food, but freshly made.  Would definitely stay here again.

Checked in tonight. Rooms feel outdated. A hole in the bedsheets. Stains on the sofa. Doorstop next to the bed. Loud AC outside of window. Room smells of Febrerze. For $210 plus tax overpriced. Asked to be moved, but they are sold out.  My first review ever. I do travel a lot for business.
Manager Response: Dear A TripAdvisor Member,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay with us. I would like to address this with you further but unfortunately, your account settings do not allow us to send you a Private Message. You are welcome to reach out to our Guest Relations Department via email at IHGCare@ihg.com or you may send us a Private Message through TripAdvisor to IHGCare including reference to your TripAdvisor Account Name so we can follow up on your experience.  Regards,  Mike F. Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: Excellent property, amazing staff and all the amenities you need!
Summary: I had just moved my family (fiancee + one month old) to California and we needed a place to stay until we found a suitable apartment. Staybridge was perfect! The one bedroom suite had a living room with sofa and an almost full kitchen with dishwasher! Three of the other key amenities were the free onsite laundry, complimentary breakfast buffet (daily) and complimentary dinner (Mon - Thur). This made our lives so much easier when caring for a newborn. It made it so we didn't need to meal plan very much. The grounds were pretty amazing. There was a nice pool area, a shaded grilling area, outdoor seating and rosemary plants around the water fountain!  The location of the property was excellent. It's within minutes of restaurants, grocery stores, Target, movie theater, etc. What

We've been so lucky this year with our hotel choices - most exceed the brand's standards, and Staybridge Lake Forest is no exception.  Check-in was a breeze and we were made to feel like welcomed guests … Bobby and I can't remember her name, (and everyone else) were just too friendly. We were greeted each and every time we entered or exited the hotel.  Everywhere we turned there were beautiful fresh flowers, even in the rest rooms!  Awesome touches and attention to detail.  Our rooms were super clean and we slept so well on the comfortable beds!  The kitchen was very-well appointed, didn't need a thing!  We spent each evening and morning out on their patio enjoying their beautiful and relaxing courtyard.  I can't believe how wonderfully quiet it was!  It was very well maintained

We stayed at this property from 07/09 to 07/12 and were very impressed.  The reception area is beautiful and the hotel itself is immaculate.  The rooms are super clean and beds are comfortable.  The complementary breakfast is outstanding, and the dinner we were able to have on Thursday was also great.  The kids used the pool and loved it.  It is in a very convenient area close to restaurants and shopping but a bit far from the beaches.  The only suggestion I would make is that the rooms are in need of a revamp, furniture is clean, however it is a bit worn.  Other than that, it was perfect.  We will definitely stay here again!

We've stayed here the last 2 years in a row and have never been disappointed! The complimentary breakfast and Manager's Reception are amazing! The staff is so wonderful! Fantastic for business travellers and families with children! The rooms and hotel itself are sooooo clean! We'll be back again and again! (No, we are not affiliated with the property, it truly is a fantastic place!)

This is a fantastic property!  I have been coming here for years when I come to town. As a travel agent/owner of CruiseOne - Erik Fischer & Associates I am always watching and reviewing all hotels I stay at as well as places I visit, restaurants, etc. The GM here is named Cleo and she is wonderful to work with. Should you have an issue (which I doubt) she will take care of it. The staff is professional, the property is comfortable and I consider this home away from home. I stay at all kinds of properties when I travel from 5 star resorts to 1 star mom and pop properties. I can't speak high enough of this property. If they are ever sold out I stay at the Hampton Inn not far but as soon as there is an opening I will move back to this property. They have a great breakfast every

Have stayed here the past three years around this time for nearby swim meet. Staff are friendly and helpful each time. The furnishings have not changed, and could use some TLC i.e. torn seam under arm cover of couch.  The bed was comfy and bathroom linens adequate. Bonus to staying here is the free bkfst each day, and free dinners a few nights a week.  Having free w/d for guest use (buy your own soap) is a plus too. Keep in mind this is an extended stay kind of place, so "lite housekeeping" for less than 7 day stay means your bed gets made and your towels are refreshed if needed. No sweeping/vaccuming each day, wash your own dishes in dishwasher with soap provided. I assume bed sheets would get changed after 7 days?  **honorable mention: Cleo called to say i'd left something in

This is our go-to hotel when we're in the area from now on. Fantastic staff, clean rooms, great FREE meals...amazing.  While checking in they noticed we were a family of 4 (husband, wife, child and mother in law) with a reservation for a 2 queen suite (we were trying to save money). They upgraded us immediately just for our own comfort! And it made a world of difference. Thank you so much, Staybridge!

Summary Heading: Nice place for a long stay (except for the breakfast)
Summary: I'll start by saying the staff is wonderful. Very helpful no matter what. I got upgraded to a one-bedroom suite which was comfortable, spacious, clean and well furnished.  The hotel offers free dinners Monday thru Thursday which are a great benefit.   My only "complaint" is the breakfast... No variety in the breakfast, the eggs are dry, the bread/bagels are dry and the toaster hardly works yet they don't seem to realize that it needs replacing. Other hotels offer much better breakfasts, with cooked-to-order omelettes or at least a variety from one day to the next.  Breakfast aside, I would recommend this hotel for its comfortable rooms and overall classy feel (compared to other extended stay hotels which are really basic).

My son had a soccer tournament in Mission Viejo. We got an unbelievable group rate discount. Room was very clean, beds were firm and my son loved the sofa couch. Free breakfast buffet was excellent. The BBQ area by the pool was perfect for out team potluck. The boys had a great time playing basketball, swimming and relaxing in the jacuzzi. Hopefully we can be back next year.

This place was amazing! The grounds are beautiful, it is literally like being at home! The suite was perfect, and exceptionally clean. There is a kitchen with a full fridge and ice maker (turn it on right away if you want ice). A nice desk, couch, t.v., comfy bed and fluffy pillows, roomy bathroom, great windows that give plenty of light.  The pool and Jacuzzi were perfect and surrounded by beautiful trees and flowers. There are a few bbq’s and benches nearby … and right next to the pool and bbq’s there is even a basketball court! We had a great time!!!  In the morning you get a GREAT breakfast! They even had miso soup which was delicious. You can tell the owners put pride into their establishment (thank you!).  We stayed here to go to the Irvine Improv and Uber’d it there.

I've been here a couple of times basically because its closed to my company and the price is reasonable. Basically they offer a sort of mini appartment with kitchen that i find very nice for long stay. Super breakfast according California standard.

We stayed here last week for 5 nights and had a wonderful stay, rooms are great, food is great, near local restaurants and target etc. Also close to laguna beach. Can't fault in anyway. All the Staff here are very good! Bobby at the front desk is wonderful, he is so friendly and welcoming and is a credit to the hotel, first class service Bobby!!! Hope to see you next year.

I did stay at this Hotel in February during a business trip, and I found the Hotel and its relaxed atmosphere an excellent choice. From the check-in onwards the staff was very friendly and helpful and did go some extra miles if they were asked friendly far some additinal amenities or support. we did stay there in a larger group and the comfy breakfast area next to the reception was a excellent place for our group to have some get together in the evening. A huge plus was also the "evening reception" with a selection of drinks a food. Its not like a dinner buffet but nevertheless its a perfect start for socializing with a larger group. Another benefit is the landscape nearby. Its quite easy to drive to the seafront or some mountain area nearby

We are a family of four (two adults, two pre-teens) traveling with my father, so we decided to stay in a two-bedroom suite.  Wow! the suite was huge, the size of a regular two-bedroom apartment! One bedroom had a king sized bed, the second one had two queens.  Each had its own large en-suite bath.  The living room, dining room and kitchen were all big.  the kitchen had *full size* stove and fridge.  The suite was quiet and spotless.  Wi fi was strong and broadband.  Three flat screen TVs with full menu of channels.  Free breakfast was one of the best I have experienced.  Multiple choices for hot breakfast, American and Asian.  Food was cooked in the hotel's own kitchen (not ready made microwaveable).  This is something I would pay money for.  The property was large and well

We stayed here last night, and for the most part, we really liked it.  Check in was easy.  We did not take advantage of the evening light meal that was served, however, the menu posted on the fridge looked good.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The pool, which was right by our room, closes at 9.  After 9, there were still noisy people at the pool, but a call to the front desk resolved that quickly.  There were two things that we didn't like.  First, the information sheet for the hotel says they have "grab and go" breakfasts, and there were none.  The second thing is that the hair dryer in room 145 did not work.  We stay near Tustin almost every Thursday during the school year, and with those two exceptions, liked it enough that if it was closer, we would probably stay here

Brilliant time at the Stay bridge Suites in Lake Forest. The rooms are mini apartments with a bedroom bathroom kitchen and lounge in each. Very clean and attentive staff, I'd stay there again without a doubt if I was in Lake Forest again.

Summary Heading: Excellent property, helpful and happy staff, and great rooms
Summary: By far the best hotel property I have lived in so far in all my travels. And I have traveled a lot. This has been a warm, wonderful experience. The reception staff is always perky, peppy and helpful at all times. They are wonderful to speak to and they ensure that I had all I needed. I would definitely recommend this property any time you are in the Lake Forest area.   I thoroughly enjoyed my time here and I would come back right here anytime I am in the area. Bobby, Erica, Jericho ...they go a long way to make the guest feel right at home. Especially guests that are away from home for extended times. A lot of hotel properties really have to learn a lot from these guys. Thank you. It has been a pleasure.  Note: They have a manager's reception in the evening with complimentary

Summary Heading: This hotel has everything you need
Summary: If you don't have a car, don't worry - the hotel has a free shuttle bus that will bring you to local businesses. Restaurants and shopping are within walking distance (about 15 minutes on foot), where you will a variety of foods, a cinema and Walmart just to mention a few. The hotel is in a quiet area with excellent value for money - free breakfast, wifi and social hour are included in the reasonable price. The food was good and there is a nice variety. You can use the laundry room free of charge too. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Business associates gathered for the social hour and discussed not just work but also non-work related topics, in a relaxed setting that was appreciated by all. I can recommend this hotel to all types of travelers.

We stayed at this Staybridge Suites in September, when we moved to Irvine.  We had stayed here a month earlier, and did not have the best stay.  I gave them a two on my original review, and was promptly contacted by the hotel apologizing, and wanting a second chance to make things right.    We gave them another chance...and they did not disappoint.  The room was perfect, and the service was exceptional.  This was just an overnight stay, after a long drive from the Bay Area with a moving truck.  We arrived at a busy hotel in the evening, and were warmly welcomed by the front desk staff.  The suite on the 2nd floor was quiet, clean and very comfortable.  Much better than our first stay.  Breakfast the next morning offered a nice variety of items to get us ready for "move-in" day.

My husband has been staying at this Staybridge Suites for a few days every other week or so the past few months on business. I finally had the opportunity to go with him last week and I saw why he always chose this hotel.  It is comfortable, well-kept, quiet and friendly. The room was large, combination bedroom- living room-kitchen. Also has a nice big desk for work. The bathroom was nice and large too. Bed was comfortable and windows had the best curtains to keep the room dark when sleeping late.   The location is great, near many restaurants and stores and has a beautiful view of mountains, which are a short drive away.   The free breakfast was very good and they have a nice variety.  There is also a light dinner 4 days a week - tacos, hamburgers, chicken wings, salad and the

Clean, comfortable and great breakfast. Evenings had a reception with some light bites. Close to highway, stores and restaurants.  Staff was great. Really a pleasant visit. Not a destination hotel, but good business hotel or for a family travelling through.  I did not know was that they are part of holiday inn chain.
Manager Response: Hi ComapssJohn, We appreciate the great feedback and are pleased that you a enjoyed your stay with us. Our entire staff thanks you for choosing us and we hope that we'll get another chance to deliver great service and a smile the next time you are in the area.  Take Care,

Summary: We spent two months at the hotel for corporate housing.  It was hard to believe, but not only did we get a great one bedroom suite, but we also had free breakfast and dinner included in our stay.  The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  We especially want to thank Bobby and Cleo at the lobby front desk.  Too bad that we were there during the winter, because the pool looked very inviting.  The courtyard is very relaxing, with a nice fountain and gazebo with barbecues available.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a hotel in the Irvine area.  Now we are spoiled from not having to cook and clean for two months.  Back to reality!
Manager Response: Dear GregR462, We appreciate all of your positive feedback and are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on making sure you have the move comfortable expereriance as possible. I guess you'll just have to come back in the summer and enjoy our pool, we'll be waiting for you.  Take Care,

Summary: The staff are very friendly and customer focused. The hotel rooms are well maintained. Complementary breakfast and dinner with ample selection.  I have had wonderful stays and great support from the staff.
Manager Response: Hi Paul, We're pleased to hear that you had another great stay with us. Its always our goal to make sure you have a great experience each and everytime you visit. so, on behalf of our entire team, THANK YOU!  Take Care,

Summary: Stayed 3 nights at the end of November, were upgraded to 1 bed suite.  Had a wonderful stay, plenty of space, good staff, a great base to get around. Would definitely stay again if in the area, absolutely great value for money.
Manager Response: Hi andy F, thanks for the great feedback. we're happy you enjoyed the hotel and its location. If you are ever back in the area, please choose to stay with us again. We won't let you down.  Take Care,

Summary: I stayed there for almost a month for a business trip and it was fun staying there. Beautiful & bg rooms. Complementary breakfast & dinner. Ample of options for breakfast. Complementary wi-fi. Big parking space. Small gym. Swimming pool. Basketball court. Friendly staff. Close to shopping center. Awesome experience. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my fellow travelers.
Manager Response: Dear vauled guest, Thank you so much for the great feedback. We understand how difficult it can be to travel away from home for a month or longer so we work hard to make sure you have all the amenities and service you need to make sure your time with us is a wonderful experience.  We appreciate yo and your company choosing us.  Take Care,

Summary: After leaving another hotel, our stay here was adequate. The front desk was very friendly and we had no problems with our room. The bathroom was clean as well as the rest of our room and there was hardly any noise from any of the other guests. Overall, our stay was OK.
Manager Response: Dear Laura E,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback. Your comments are highly valuable to us and will assist us in our continuous efforts to maintain and improve the service level we aim for. I am pleased to know that you had a satisfactory stay at our hotel and are delighted to hear that you found our front desk friendly and rooms clean. I appreciate feedback that we receive, whether positive and negative to ensure we provide the best level of service and facilities that we can give to our guests. Thank you again for your review and I hope to have an opportunity of welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Krysllin G. Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, highly recommended!!
Summary: Tidy clean rooms, attentive and friendly staff, quiet location, elegant decor, complementary food and drink, complementary internet, and dvds at reception. Good location not far from shops, smoking area, plenty of parking. I will definitely stay here again. Thank you Cleo, Bobby, Mimi, Reggie, Claudia and Co.
Manager Response: Hi Mytewcents, You opinion is very valuable (more than tew cents). we appreciate the positive feedback and hope you  plan to return and stay with us again. We look forward to your visit in the future.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Few Broken Appliances, but a Good, Clean Hotel
Summary: We had a great 5 day stay at Staybridge Suites.  Depending on your needs, it is located in a convenient area, outside of the hustle and bustle, but less than 5 minutes from a Target, a few restaurants and shopping areas. We were going to a conference at Saddleback Church, which was also about 5 minutes away.  Our only issues were regarding some appliances not working.  For the first 3 days, the fridge/freezer in their Hotel Shop was broken, so no cold or frozen food/snacks available (though it was fixed the last 2 days).  Then, one of the three washers was broken the first time I used it.  Two days later, two of the three were broken.  Other than these slight problems, I would recommend the hotel and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear f8thfull21, thanks so much for the constructive and positive feedback. We try to stay on top of these small but common issues when many people are using the equipment. rest assured these issue have been address and plans are in place to minimize these types of incidents in the future. we hope that you return and stay with us in the near future to complete your wonderful experience while staying with us.  Take Care,

Summary: We stayed here for two weeks, so my review comes from a relatively long experience.  Located in a quite business park, with very little traffic. Within 5 mins drive there are plenty of shopping and dinning options. within a 20 mins drive to all Orange County attractions, Disneyland, Newport Beach, Fashion Island ...etc. Advantageous location if you are planning to visit San Diego, only 1 hr drive.  Suites are spacious with a separate living and bedroom. One LCD in each room. Well equipped kitchen and full size fredg.  Amenities and facilities are top qualities and very well maintained. Free wifi. Good breakfast. Free laundry.  Staff are excellent and very helpful.
Manager Response: Hi curioustraveller78, Thank you so much for the great feedback. We truly pride ourselves on providing the best service and amenities possible. We know you have coices so we appreciate you staying with us and hope to have you back in the future.  Take Care,

Summary: My fiance, daughter and I stayed for a night on the 18th(Saturday) until we checked out on Sunday and this is my honest review. The rooms were a nice size comparable to a studio apartment and it included a 42 inch flat screen tv with a nice queen bed which was very comfortable. The fold out couch was a nice addition but the cushions were worn a little and had 2 6 inch tears in them (not a big deal but should be replaced someday) the carpet was newer and the room smelled great. It had a on counter burner for cooking food. (No oven) Dishwasher, microwave, toaster. The bathroom was very large with a nice sized closet and a bathtub/Shower combo. Overall it was a pleasant experience and I would recommend this to other family's with 1-2 kids. The breakfast buffet was a nice addition
Manager Response: Hi DannyJ, Thak you for choosing to stay with us and we are so pleased that you had a great experience while stay with us. Our staff tryly takes pride in making sure guests like yourself have a wonderful experience under our care. please come back and stay with us soon.  Take Care,

Summary: I stay at this location at least one week a month for the last year and have never been disappointed.  The staff is outstanding, rooms are clean and comfortable. Free breakfast and evening dinner are decent. Overall always an excellent experience.  BOBBY, CLEO, CLAUDIA and MIMI are the best!
Manager Response: Hi DevonW, thanks for the great feedback and support of our hotel and staff. we'll continue to do our best to support and take care of you whiles staying with us.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Old people's home feel, ok for a night or two if you must.
Summary: Have stayed here a number of times over the years on business trips. Staff are very friendly. The breakfast is acceptable, but the dinner that used to get served Mon-Thursday was barely palatable and boring. Decided to break rank and now stay in either Holiday Inn in spectrum or Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear RakishDriver,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are pleased to know you liked the friendliness of our staff. However, we're sorry our dinner options did not live up to your expectations. Please be assured that your comments have been documented and will be used for review and improvements. Thank you for staying and we all hope to have an opportunity to serve you again on your next future visit.  Sincerely,  Anthony M Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: Extremely happy with friendliness and responsiveness of staff
Summary: I've stayed at Staybridge for at least two months spread across three different stays and every time has been great. The rooms are very spacious, housekeeping does a good job. I have one minor complaint in that the toilet paper wasn't always replenished in good time, but other than that everything with my stays have been great. Bobby and Claudia from reception were both exceptionally helpful and responsive to any issues/requirements I had and were very friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Hi Tom K, thank you so much for your positive feedback. Our entire team including Bobby and Claudia take great pride in making sure you have a wonderful stay from check-in to check-out. We know you have choices and appreciate you choosing to stay with us. we'll do our best to continue providing yuo with a great experience. looking forward to seeing you in the near future.  Thank You,

Summary Heading: Very good value for the money
Summary: We took a two bedroom suite and it was very spacious Breakfast was not bad at all Free wifi all over the hotel Very quite area Free parking  Speedy service Nice little lobby Located off Bake Parkway which gives it easy access Very close to Towne Center shopping area; Target, WalMart,,,,
Manager Response: Dear Almaziad, Thank You for your great feedback and our entire staff appreciate you choosing to stay with us. We pride ourselves on providing the best hotel experience in the Lake Forest area. We hope you are back in the area soon and choose us again. i'm sure we will work just as hard to ensure a fabulous stay.  Take Care,
