Summary: STAY: 4nights/3days (first time)  EVENT: Couple weekend get-away  ROOM: Just as advertised, clean and you have what you need for the kitchen, bathroom and bedroom  PLUS:  1. Free breakfast (you really have a variety to choose from, the meat varies daily, the servers are always checking for anything that need more, also i like having "real" plates, glass and utensils available) 2. I was worried about cooking or heating up food because of the smell but suprisingly the vent did realllllly work. 3. The place was NOT noisy nor unsafe, close to places that we planned on visiting. 4. Staff was friendly and helpful. ( We called to have the top floor and end-of-hallway room and that what we got)  WILL I GO BACK: Yes
Manager Response: Dear mem68ber, We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. thank you so much for the great feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We hope that you choose to come back during your next visit to the area.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Be sure to specify non-smoking room if you want one.
Summary: Disgusting smoking room assigned by mistake. Entire floor reeked! Room stuck of cloying air freshener attempting, but failing, to cover it up.  Front desk attendant hesitated in moving us, taking 20 minutes to get approval from manager by phone. Once moved, the new room (on an entirely different wing of building) was more than adequate.
Manager Response: Hello  DS32588, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience staying with us. although it is never our intent to place a non-smoking guest in a smoking room, We apologize that you had to stay in one of the few smoking rooms we have. In most cases we can avoid these situations but in the busier months, when we are sold out each night, situations like this occur and we do our very best to prevent it from happening or to rectify the situation as soon as we can. We will also begin renovation of the hotel by the end of the year which will eliminate any smoking rooms from the hotel all together. we appreciate your constructive feedback and hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with a great hotel stay.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Good hotel in between San Diego and Los Angeles
Summary: Nice property in Lake Side. 5 minute drive to a major shopping center with restaurants and stores (Target, Walmart). We had a two room suite. We stayed four nights at this property. The hotel is clean and staff are friendly. Breakfast was decent with hot and cold choices. There is a pool, basketball court, and free laundry.
Manager Response: Dear AFshinM, Thanks so much for the positive feedback, our staff appreciates your business as we all know you have choices. We hope to earn your business again in the near future.  Take Care,

Summary: From the time we checked in until the time we checked out, nothing but superior front desk services, friendly housekeeping and guest services, and truly professional management.  Thank you Cleo, Mimi, and all the employees of Staybridge Suites Irvine for taking care of the Hawaii Rush Soccer Club.  Aloha!!!
Manager Response: Hellow Wahine kapu, We enjoyed having you and the entire rush organization stay with us. Our team wanted your team to have the best expeience possible after traveling from Hawaii and and being so far away from home while competing in orange county. We're happy to hear everything went well for you and hope to see you again next year. Go Rush!!!  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Great stay for a wedding weekend!
Summary: We stayed here for a wedding weekend, along with all of our other friends. The hotel was great. The location is convenient for the area, it is nicely and comfortably decorated, very clean, and they have a full breakfast available in the mornings! Couldn't have asked for anything better for the weekend.
Manager Response: Hi Melissa, Thaks for the great comments during your stay and thank you choosing Staybridge Suites lake Forest/Irvine East. please visit us again when visiting the area. We'd love to have you back.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Very good value, rooms...  What else do you need.
Summary: Booked this hotel for both it's rate and general location.  You are near every possible restaurant and national store.  Breakfast is excellent and the hotel is very quiet.  Rooms are borderline huge.  I have stayed in other Staybridge and these rooms are probably 80 sq ft bigger.   Fellow guests at least during our stay seemed to be families, many of whom were headed out to church during our breakfast.  The courtyard area was open and nice with grills and a large pool and good sized hot tub. Staff were always helpful when we needed them and took care of any request immediately.   The exact location is not visible from the main road, I drove right by it originally.  That said a really good hotel at a really good price.
Manager Response: Dear Disneyland Family, Thank You for choosing Staybridge Suites lake forest/irvine East. We really appreciate your wonderful comments we're very happy that yo enjoyed your stay. Our goal is to make sure everyone enjoys their time while staying with us and we hope to have you back in the near future.  Enjoy,

Summary: I love this hotel! Breakfast and dinner is always awesome.  But the staff makes the place worth it.  Special thanks to Bobby he has been a great help to my entire stay, every hotel needs a guy like him!
Manager Response: Hi Noelm99, Thanks so much for the positive feedback. We appreciate you choosing us as your hotel and we hope to have you back very soon. our entire team, including bobby are looking forward to it.  Take Care,

Summary: Loved everything about this hotel:  really comfortable beds, modern and clean suites, well-equipped kitchen, excellent food at the breakfast buffet and the one evening reception attended, quiet location off the main roads, very friendly and helpful staff (thanks especially to Bobby).  Perfect temperature control in the rooms.  Plenty of free parking was also a plus in this area.  I look forward to coming back.
Manager Response: Hello 20Anne20, Thanks so much for taking the time to write such positive feedback. our entire staff, including Bobby takes pride in making sure you have a wonderful stay whille staying with us. We all hope to have you back  really soon.  Take Care,

Summary: I stayed here this past weekend in a Studio Suite. Overall, my stay was great except for a few minor inconveniences.   PROS: The agent at the front desk upon check-in was very nice as was all of the other staff. The room was very clean and the complimentary breakfast was great!  CONS: I had been looking forward to getting into the hot tub, only to realize when I got there that the jets were not working properly. Then, I realized that the towel rack was completely empty. We had to go to the front desk to request towels for the pool. Also, we did not have a can opener in our room and upon requesting one they brought us one that did not work!  Overall the pros definitely outweigh the cons and I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Karina, Thank you for both the positve and constructive feedback. We take great pride in improving our level of service and will take these comments seriously. the moter in the hottub went down and we did everthing in our power to get it up and running as quckly as possible. I'm sure if you stay with us again, you hot tub experience wil be much better as it should be working just fine. Please give us an opportunity to improve on your last experience. Just contact us whne making your next reservations.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: Very clean, nice for families or groups
Summary: Have stayed here twice for junior sports travel events (weekend water polo tournament). Rooms are nice and big, boys have have had large rooms while parents had suites with kitchens.  Last stay was February 2014.  Staff is super helpful. Breakfast is nicely done, with eggs, bacon, pancakes and the usual other continental stuff. Kitchen staff even filled our huge cooler with ice for us.  Outside areas are clean and attractive. Pool and basketball court kept the teen boys happy and occupied. Barbeque area has plenty of seating.   Hotel always seems to have several traveling teams staying, yet we've never had an issue with noise or late night antics -- ,maybe because the kids are tired out, are serious about their sports and are well chaperoned.  Big mall is about a mile away,
Manager Response: Dear Dan B, Thank you for the great feedback and comments regarding our hotel. We're happuy you enjoyed your stay and your endorsement really makes our staff feel proud about the service they try to provide each and everyday. Please continue to be an advocate of Staybridge and  we hope to have you back with us very soon.  Take Care,

Summary: My family stayed in a 2-bedroom suite for a week and enjoyed our stay overall.  Pros: 1) Two full bathrooms in the suite.  2) Good daily breakfast. 3) Free laundry facilities. 4) Close to restaurants, grocery stores, and shopping.  Cons: 1) The room was starting to show its age.  There was a crack in the shower, as if someone had punched the wall.  The bathroom floor was uneven.  2) The garbage bins are too small.  We often filled another bag and left it by the bin to be disposed of by Housekeeping.  3) Most of the staff was great, although we did encounter a couple employees in the breakfast area who ignored us when we pointed out the malfunctioning waffle batter contraption.  They did fix it, but didn't speak the entire time and acted like we were inconveniencing them.  4)
Manager Response: Dear vauled guest, We appreciate both the positive and constructive comments. It's the mission of our entire staff to ensure that you have a great expeerince while staying with us, from the check-in process to the comfort of your suite. We will soon begin a reneovation of our hotel so please consider giving us another try when you return to the area.  Sincerely General Manager

Summary: I needed a place to stay on a Friday night as I was on my way north of Los Angeles from San Diego.  Rather than battle the LA traffic at 5:00 pm on a Friday night, I elected to stay here for the night and make my escape from LA early Saturday morning.  Check in was quick and painless.  The room was a large and comfortable suite with kitchenette, couch, and queen size bed.  The front desk was helpful when I asked about nearby restaurants.  They directed me to a large shopping center that had plenty of options for dinner.  I checked out of the hotel early Saturday morning and was on my way.  The room was pleasant, the price was right, and I had just what I needed ... a place to stay until I could make my escape through LA.
Manager Response: Hello BB, Thank you for the kind comments and we are especially happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Our staff takes pride in making sure you have the best experience possible so if ever in the area again, please consider us and i'm sure we will give a maximum effort to repeat our performance.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: A great place to stay if you are in the area
Summary: This is a modern hotel with a variety of amenities, from basketball courts to a great swimming pool, to even the presence of barbeques in a garden-like setting. Breakfast was nice and totally satisfying. We were a bit disconcerted at first when we realized the hotel was in the middle of a seemingly deserted area, but were quickly put at ease when we learned that, a scant two blocks away, there was a commercial area with stores, supermarkets, and restaurants. We would certainly recommend this hotel if someone has business to transact in the surrounding area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Our entire staff thanks you for the positive comments. We work hard to make you stay as enjoyable as we can. We know you have choices so we appreciate your business and hope to see you back with us soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect corporate hotel - would go back!
Summary: This hotel is in the middle of a block of corporate offices so there is definitely not much going on around at night but this Staybridge Suites plans for your business trip:  1) They offer a shuttle to the local offices (Wonderware, Oakley, Black & Decker) and will pick you up and drop you off as needed, just schedule with the front desk 2) A hot breakfast is included with your room which is great - includes coffee, fruit, and various buffet items that are actually edible 3) A hot dinner is served Monday through Thursday nights including beer and wine. You can't beat that! Salad bar is pretty full and there are three hot items. The nights I was there they had chicken cordon bleu one night and wings the next.  4) Internet is decent, not spotty. Fast enough to work on.  Perfect
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thanks so much for choosing to stay with us during your business trip. our entire takes pride in making sure you have a great stay. We'll continue to do our best to see to it that your experience remains consistent. Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Return guest....and will see you again next year!
Summary: Clean, clean & clean.  Stayed there last year while visiting family and again this year.  Easy access to most everything in Orange County.  Wonderful value:  breakfast & wi-fi included, washer/dryer for guest use, biz center w/computer & printer access.  Because there are so many biz people using their facility they even offer a mixer dinner 3 nites a week including beer & wine.  I am a vegetarian - there was always something for me to eat.  Dining staff was always attentive and cleaning in/around the areas.  Outside area has pool, hottub, basketball court and nice places to sit & read.  Staybridge suites is also safety minded.....with key card access to workout room, laundry, biz center etc.  Only negative was that the computers run VERY slow.  We will be back again next year.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, We are happy to hear that you'll return for another visit. Our entire team takes pride in making sure you have a wonderful experience when staying with us and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Thank you Staybridge staff for providing me with such a great stay! Highly recommended!
Summary: Today is my last night here and I am so pleased with my stay that I would like to pass along this great experience. I am attending a training from Omnex that was happening at this hotel so staying here was the obvious choice. Anyhow, I was not disappointed at all with the place, the rooms are big, clean, comfortable, have a mini kitchen, large flat screen, and free-fast wireless! In addition, a great breakfast and dinner buffet were included on my stay. I travel at lot for business and leisure and this was the FIRST time that I had no consumption at a hotel, I haven't spent a penny more than what I prepaid for the room. Parking was also complementary and the gym has a excellent Treadmill! The only small downside is that the AC is kind of loud, but still I would give them a 95%
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We know you have choices and we are extremely happy for the opportunity to make your trip the best experience possible. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I had to stay here for business and was BEYOND amazed!  The rooms are so comfy, so roomy and don't feel like a hotel at all.  They are equipped with a kitchenette, cookware, serveware and utentsils and a full-sized refrigerator.  The beds are very comfortable and come with plenty of pillows.  Rooms come with a DVD player in the room, so you can bring your own DVDs to watch or rent some from the front desk.  The bathrooms are great!  Big beautiful bathrooms with a nice, large closet, full-sized shower and bathtub.  The best part is they serve the best breakfast every morning and all-you-can-eat dinner.  The breakfast is not cheap continental breakfast either.  Oatmeal, eggs, bacon, sausage, fresh fruit and coffee, tea, milk and plenty of juice choices.  With dinner, FREE wine and
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, We're  so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. our goal is to make sure that all of your lodging needs are met when traveling to our area and give you that "home away from home" experience. It sounds like we accomplished that and hope that you give a chance to do again and again. thanks you for choosing Staybridge Suites - Lake Forest.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 3 nights in June for a vacation. I am a Priority Club Platinum member.  Location: The hotel is located in a quiet business park in Lake Forest. It's close to the 241 (tollway) and only a few miles from the I-5. It appears the hotel caters primarily to business guests who have work in the area. There is not much going on in the immediate vicinity as it's mostly office buildings along Bake Parkway. There are some restaurants just north of the 241. As long as you have a car, you can find pretty much anything within a 10 minute drive.   Check-In: We arrived around 9pm on a Friday night and it was quiet. Check-in was fast. The front desk staff was pretty helpful and we received some snack bags for the kids.  Property/Room: The property looks relatively
Manager Response: Dear intlSalesguy, Wow! Thank you for the great feedback and comments of our hotel and location. You did an excellent job of describing us. we are in a very quiet area and away from all the crazy OC traffic but we are close enough to get to the most popular destinations in no time. Thank you for choosing us and we hope that you and your family decide to stay with us again if you are in the area.  Take Care,

Summary Heading: A decent hotel, but nothing special
Summary: Having stayed in an excellent Staybridge Suites in another state, I had high expectations for this hotel. We were generally disappointed. The rooms were okay, not great. The office chair was falling apart. The beds are not comfortable, and as mentioned in previous reviews, the hotel has only ridiculous square pillows. The funny thing is, the hotel puts an ad on your bed bragging about those mediocre square pillows.    The included breakfast is good, and the staff is friendly. Overall, it is a decent hotel, but nothing more.
Manager Response: Dear Macdaddy18,  Thank you so much for your candid review of our hotel. I apologize you were not fully satisfied with your accommodations. We just want to assure you that our hotel is very proud of its level of service, cleanliness and quality of its product. We regret falling short of your expectations on this particular day. I have taken note of your comments and we will use these to monitor and improve the quality of product and services we offer to our guests.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope that we can better serve you next time.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: This is a very nice facility
Summary: Enjoyed a great and comfortable bed, extraordinary breakfast, helpful staff, nice pool, jacuzzi and peaceful courtyard with a small-scale basketball court and surprised to have a free dinner moal three nights a week.  The room was spacious and nicely appointed , including a comfortable pullout sofa bed.  Spent a week here am am very satisfied.
Manager Response: Hi Chazdt, thanks you for taking the ime to provide your feedback of our hotel. We are very pleased that you enjoyed yourself and hope that you decide to choose us if ever back in the area. we know you have choices so thank you for choosing us to host your stay.  Take Care,

Summary: I was staying in the stay bridge suites in lake forest CA due to a business trip and received the upmost customer care. I was left carless due to unfortunate circumstances and was instructed by the front desk where the local target store was located. I walked the 1 mile and ran into one of the front desk specialist who happened to be off from work. Claudia was the young lady's name gave me a ride back to the hotel even though she was technically not on the clock.  That there is awesome customer service to the finest. Thank you to Claudia and the staff of Staybridge in lake forest CA
Manager Response: Hi FreddyB, Thanks so much for taking the time to comment on our staff and customer service. Our entire staff including Claudia takes pride in making sure you have the most comfortable hotel experience while away from home. Please come back and stay with us again if you are in the area and we'll continue to take good care of you while hosting your stay.  take care,

Summary Heading: Nice place - but Internet is very bad
Summary: This is a good clean place to stay. The staff was nice, and the breakfast was OK. The rooms are very comfortable. But they have a major lack of internet bandwidth and it is extremely slow. I discussed with the front desk and they said they knew about the problem and were sorry they couldn't do anything about it. The wireless is actually very strong, but the internet line the hotel has just can't handle the capacity. I would recommend this place, unless you need to use the internet during your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Bob E ,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with such important information about your recent stay. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced while visiting our hotel. I have taken note of your comments regarding the internet service and your review will be used to reconsider improvements needed and I hope that you would give us a chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  Again, many thanks for the feedback and our apologies for the shortcomings.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

Summary Heading: A good place for a longer stay
Summary: It's perfect for business travelers who need to stay several days. With almost direct access to your room straight from the parking lot, you don't bother other travelers. The main room is the place where all get together for complimentary breakfast and diner. There's an open air pool and gym as well  Rooms offer kitchen and two large TV screens. Wifi is complimentary. A place to recommend!
Manager Response: Dear MPH010,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review regarding your recent stay. We appreciate all feedback we receive and use it to help develop the product and the service we offer.  We are pleased to note that you enjoyed your overall experience with us. Our aim  is to make sure that we provide an environment of comfort and value to our guests and I am glad that you were satisfied with the services and amenities that we have to offer.   Thank you again for staying with us and for recommending our hotel to other travelers. We hope you continue to choose us in the future.   Sincerely,   Dhan M Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: Our daughter's soccer team stayed here for a tournament in Mission Viejo.  Great family accomodations!  Nice pool with clean and very well kept grounds.  Picnic and barbeque areas are fantastic.  Clean grills!  The breakfast is one of the best I've tasted and with great variety.  The lobby area and common areas are very clean and comfortable.  The rooms are nice and the bedding is decent but the pillows are HORRIBLE.  Bring your own!  The bathrooms could also use some repair as they do not match the rest of the hotel that looks nice and well kept.  We stayed only two nights and it met our needs very well.
Manager Response: Hello Webinvensible, Thank you so much for yor comments and feedback. Our entire staff is always looking to improve our performance and our guest's experience. Althourgh we still have work to do, we are in the process of upgrading our pillows package with the brand as well as renovating the hotel soon(including the bathrooms). These changes will help improve your personal experince at our  hotel if you are so kind to give us another opportunty to completely satisfy you during your next stay in the area.  If there is anything we can do to help when planning your next stay, please feel free to contact us.  Sincerely,  General Manager

Summary: I stayed for business. The rate seemed comparable for the area. Unless you want to stay in a motel 6, you are going to end up paying in the $125 - $150/night range.  Firstly, they have a free lunch AND dinner buffet nightly (although I think the dinner may only be during the week).  Its more of a light dinner with rotating menu but it was pretty good nonetheless. Full salad bar, chicken strips, french fries, etc.  And a nice big room with lots of tables and some big screen TV's.  They also have free sodas and fruit juices and then best of all a free "help yourself" beer tap.  In the morning the breakfast was pretty nice. Eggs, potato thingies, some meat, cereal, make your own waffles, rice (who eats rice for breakfast??), fruit juices, and soda. No beer for breakfast tho.  Rooms
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure that you have the best experieince as possible so we are happy to read responses like yours. We know that you have choices so thank you for choosing to stay with us. As for the pillows, we have larger pillows avaialble for guest that perfer larger sizes such as yourself. Let us know about your next stay with us and we'll have those larger pillows waiting for you.  Sincerely,
